author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.Com
title: Lily Collins lights up rainy weekend with makeup free face | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share She carried a black shoulder bag with fringe and had on a grey tee shirt underneath an olive green, mid-length jacket with a fur-lined hood. Lily sipped on a green juice as she walked along, with her hair pulled up. Casual style: The British-American actor and model wore slouchy pants pulled up to her mid-calves with sheer panels just above her knee On Saturday, she made mention of the dreary weather in Los Angeles in the caption for a photo she posted to social media. She dressed up a black beanie and grey duster over a white tee with a plump, red lip and black eyeliner in the snapshot. 'Finding the bright side in this rainy LA traffic...,' the Mirror Mirror star wrote with the car selfie. Rainy days: On Saturday, she made mention of the dreary weather in Los Angeles in the caption for a photo she posted to social media Lily, who just appeared in Warren Beatty's Rules Don't Apply and will star in 2017's To the Bone, Okja and Halo of Stars, also recently published her first book. Writing her memoir, titled Unfiltered: No Shame, No Regrets, Just Me, was 'definitely like having my diary published,' Lily told People magazine . 'This is my way to open up conversation with young women and say, 'Hey, weâ€™re all the same,'' she said, of writing about 'dark places,' including past relationships. The collection of essays will be released on March 7 and is available for pre-order now.
